about_the_game:
Do you like puzzles? Do you like dice? Do you like really difficult 3D puzzles that you solve by rolling dice around?

Me too. I'd love to play a game like that. But I couldn't because there wasn't one.

You're welcome.



The goal of each puzzle is simple: reach the exit with a die. See: it's just over there! Sometimes it will be right next to you. How hard can it be?

Turns out it can be very, very hard indeed. Which is why there's an 'undo' button and no time limit. I mean, the sun's gonna burn out at some point but until then, no pressure.



You'll uncover hundreds of puzzles, dozens of cunning puzzle mechanics, and a whole interconnected map to explore. Collect dice and use them to solve old puzzles new ways, find coins and buy upgrades to help you track down secrets, and become the undisputed Dice Master! It's totally worth the effort! And the money! Especially the money! So worth it.

name: DIE DIE DIE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 2.7GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The puzzle game for people who like dice... and want to stop. Roll your way around a sprawling, non-linear map solving ever-more perplexing puzzles! Discover dozens of unique puzzle mechanics! Collect dice! Just... maybe don't play it on a laptop near a window if you own either of them...
